page.title: 02RELIGION-CHRISTIAN CHURCHES
page.content: There are five Christian Churches in East Leake and one C.ofE. in West Leake. The Churches in E.Leake are as follows:-C.ofE.,R.C.,Baptist,Methodist ,Evangelical(Village Hall). The R.C.Church has the highest number of Sunday worshippers. The Evangelical Church is the newest,being formed within the last three years. When interviewed,Church Leaders reported that there is a growing interest in Religion throughout the area. All the Churches support various societies and clubs including:-Sunday Schools,Choirs,Youth Groups,separate men's and ladies'groups,prayer groups,Bible study groups.
